body:
## :package: Dependency Upgrades

- Bump sonarqube-gradle-plugin from 3.4.0.2513 to 3.5.0.2730 [#718](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/718)
- Bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.7.4 to 2.7.5 [#717](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/717)
- Bump checker-qual from 3.25.0 to 3.26.0 [#712](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/712)

## :package: Dependency Upgrades

- Bump slf4j-api from 2.0.0 to 2.0.3 [#701](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/701)[#703](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/703)[#709](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/709)

- Bump checker-qual from 3.24.0 to 3.25.0 [#697](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/697)

## :star: Enhancements

- Add "hybrid" AuthenticatorTransport [#687](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/687)
- add support for additional BE and BS flags [#685](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/685)

## :package: Dependency Upgrades

- Bump slf4j-api from 1.7.36 to 2.0.0 [#688](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/688)
- Bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.7.2 to 2.7.3 [#686](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/686)
- Bump checker-qual from 3.23.0 to 3.24.0 [#684](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/684)

## :heart: Contributors

We'd like to thank all the contributors who worked on this release!

- [@sandeepdhankar-okta](https://github.com/sandeepdhankar-okta)

## :beetle: Bugs

- Address NoSuchMethodError issue when using ByteBuffer in AuthenticatorDataConverter [#676](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/676)

## :package: Dependency Upgrades

- Bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.7.1 to 2.7.2 [#678](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/678)
- Bump checker-qual from 3.22.2 to 3.23.0 [#675](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/675)

## :star: Enhancements

- Fix typo in Japanese reference [#671](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/671)

## :package: Dependency Upgrades

- Bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.7.0 to 2.7.1 [#670](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/670)
- Bump checker-qual from 3.22.1 to 3.22.2 [#669](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/669)
- Bump checker-qual from 3.22.0 to 3.22.1 [#667](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/667)
- Bump sonarqube-gradle-plugin from 3.3 to 3.4.0.2513 [#668](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/668)

## :heart: Contributors

We'd like to thank all the contributors who worked on this release!

- [@inabajunmr](https://github.com/inabajunmr)

## :warning: Breaking Changes

- Add EdDSA support [#662](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/662)
- Correct AuthenticationAlgorithm(0x0011) value [#657](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/657)

## :star: Enhancements

- Move spring boot BOM to test dependency only [#663](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/663)

## :package: Dependency Upgrades

- Bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.6.7 to 2.7.0 [#661](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/661)

## :warning: Breaking Changes

## :beetle: Bugs

- Bump checker-qual from 3.21.0 to 3.21.1 [#626](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/626)

## :beetle: Bugs

- Bugfix: equals method of container classes are broken by #574 [#617](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/617)
- Fixing broken equals() method of AuthenticatorSelectionCriteria [#616](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/616)
- Correct the description error in the Japanese translation [#611](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/611)

## :star: Enhancements

- Add unknown TokenBindingStatus validation [#623](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/623)

## :package: Dependency Upgrades

- Bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.6.1 to 2.6.2 [#622](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/622)

- Bump bouncyCastleVersion from 1.69 to 1.70 [#607](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/607)

## :heart: Contributors

We'd like to thank all the contributors who worked on this release!

- [@lajos-kiss](https://github.com/lajos-kiss)
- [@kuraun](https://github.com/kuraun)

name: 0.18.1.RELEASE
body:
## :warning: Breaking Changes

- Add fido registry predefined values [#597](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/597)

## :star: Enhancements

- Make classes converted from enum Serializable [#598](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/598)

## :package: Dependency Upgrades

- Bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.5.6 to 2.6.1 [#601](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/601) [#602](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/602) [#604](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/604)
- Bump checker-qual from 3.18.1 to 3.19.0 [#596](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/596)

## :beetle: Bugs

- Bugfix: Correct AuthenticationAlgorithm type definition [#600](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/600)


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/compare/0.18.0.RELEASE...0.18.1.RELEASE

name: 0.18.0.RELEASE
body:
## :warning: Breaking Changes

- Move Custom Serializers and Deserializers to json or cbor package [#593](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/593)
- Convert from enum to class [#574](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/574)

## :star: Enhancements

- Add document about App Attest environment validation [#591](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/591)
- Remove dependency-check-gradle [#588](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/588)

## :package: Dependency Upgrades

- Bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.5.5 to 2.5.6 [#587](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/587)
- Bump dependency-check-gradle from 6.3.2 to 6.4.1.1 [#586](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/586)
- Bump checker-qual from 3.18.0 to 3.18.1 [#583](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/583)
- Bump jacksonVersion from 2.12.5 to 2.13.0 [#582](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/582)

## :star: Enhancements

- JDK 17 support [#576](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/576)
- Correct authenticator extension serialization [#575](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/575)

## :package: Dependency Upgrades

- Bump jacksonVersion from 2.12.4 to 2.12.5 [#570](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/570)
- Bump checker-qual from 3.17.0 to 3.18.0 [#573](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/573)
- Bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.5.4 to 2.5.5 [#577](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/577)
- Update gradle to 7.2 [#578](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/578)
- Bump dependency-check-gradle from 6.3.0 to 6.3.2 [#579](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/579) [#571](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/571)

## :beetle: Bugs

- Bugfix: SingleValueExtensionInputBase inheritance [#551](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/551)

## :star: Enhancements

- Align CTAP CBOR encording [#559](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/559)
- Order PublicKeyCredentialDescriptor [#558](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/558)
- Order CBOR map fields [#556](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/556)
- Add code comments to explain why it is safe to timing attack [#554](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/554)
- Add hmac-secret extension data classes [#552](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/552)
- Correct AuthenticationParameters javadoc [#547](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/547)

## :package: Dependency Upgrades

- Bump dependency-check-gradle from 6.2.2 to 6.3.0 [#566](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/566)
- Bump mockitoVersion from 3.11.2 to 3.12.4 [#563](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/563) [#562](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/562) [#561](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/561) [#560](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/560) [#557](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/557)
- Bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.5.3 to 2.5.4 [#555](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/555)
- Bump checker-qual from 3.16.0 to 3.17.0 [#548](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/548)

## :warning: Breaking Changes

- Add verifications introduced from WebAuthn L2 [#534](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/534)

## :star: Enhancements

- Make algorithm classes serializable [#537](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/537)

## :package: Dependency Upgrades

- Bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.5.2 to 2.5.3 [#538](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/538)
- Bump checker-qual from 3.15.0 to 3.16.0 [#536](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/536)

## :beetle: Bugs

- Fix missing credenital id from assertion of non-resident credential. [#517](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/517)

## :package: Dependency Upgrades

- Bump checker-qual from 3.13.0 to 3.15.0 [#524](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/524)[#515](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/515)
- Bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.5.0 to 2.5.2 [#526](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/526)[#520](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/520)
- Bump mockitoVersion from 3.10.0 to 3.11.2 [#525](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/525)[#523](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/523)[#516](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/516)
- Bump bouncyCastleVersion from 1.68 to 1.69 [#519](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/519)
- Bump sonarqube-gradle-plugin from 3.2.0 to 3.3 [#521](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/521)
- Bump dependency-check-gradle from 6.2.0 to 6.2.2 [#522](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/522)[#518](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/518)

## :heart: Contributors

We'd like to thank all the contributors who worked on this release!

- [@JackOfMostTrades](https://github.com/JackOfMostTrades)

## :warning: Breaking Changes

- Remove embedded-fido-mds-root-certificate and corresponding constructors [#508](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/508)
  - This only affects webauthn4j-metadata module.

## :beetle: Bugs

- Fix bugs using non-resident keys in WebAuthnModelAuthenticator. [#510](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/510)
  - This only affects webauthn4j-test module.

## :package: Dependency Upgrades

- Bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.4.5 to 2.5.0 [#511](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/511)
- Bump dependency-check-gradle from 6.1.6 to 6.2.0 [#512](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/512)
- Bump mockitoVersion from 3.9.0 to 3.10.0 [#509](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/509)
- Bump checker-qual from 3.12.0 to 3.13.0 [#506](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/506)

## :heart: Contributors

We'd like to thank all the contributors who worked on this release!

- [@JackOfMostTrades](https://github.com/JackOfMostTrades)

## :warning: Breaking Changes

- Remove deprecated code [#484](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/484)

## :star: Enhancements

- Add crossOrigin member to CollectedClientData [#496](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/496)
- Correct CipherUtil to suppress warning [#495](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/495)
- Add SimpleTrustAnchorsProvider [#493](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/493)

## :package: Dependency Upgrades

- Bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.4.4 to 2.4.5 [#494](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/494)
- Bump sonarqube-gradle-plugin from 3.1.1 to 3.2.0 [#498](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/498)
- Bump dependency-check-gradle from 6.1.5 to 6.1.6 [#497](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/497)
- Bump mockitoVersion from 3.8.0 to 3.9.0 [#491](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/491)
- Bump checker-qual from 3.11.0 to 3.12.0 [#485](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/485)

## :beetle: Bugs

- Bugfix: Exception thrown when overlapping entries are returned [#492](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/492)
- Bugfix: PublicKeyCredentialUserEntity cannot be deserialized [#490](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/490)
- Initialized customRegistrationValidators in contructor [#489](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/489)

## :heart: Contributors

We'd like to thank all the contributors who worked on this release!

- [@inspirsea](https://github.com/inspirsea)

## :beetle: Bugs

- Add publish condition [#481](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/481)

**This release is broken (Not published properly to Maven Central). Please use [0.15.1.RELEASE](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/releases/tag/0.15.1.RELEASE) instead.**

## :warning: Breaking Changes

- Clarify nullability for better Kotlin interoperability
  - Clarify nullability for better Kotlin interoperability [#372](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/372)
  - Correct WebAuthn data class nullability [#429](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/429)
  - Make AuthenticationData member nullable [#376](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/376)
  - Redesign converter return value nullability [#401](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/401)
  - Clarify webauthn4j-device-check module classes nullability [#394](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/394)
  - Make AndroidSafetyNetAttestationStatement Response members nullable [#383](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/383)
  - Make AuthenticatorSelectionCriteria.requireResidentKey nullable [#382](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/382)
  - Refine ServerProperty nullability and remove getOrigin method [#375](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/375)
  - Redesign Converters not to pass through null value [#373](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/373)
  - Add null check assertion to non-null marked members [#400](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/400)
  - Polish Nullability annotations [#476](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/476)
  - Polish null check logic [#475](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/475)
  - Move Parameters classes non-null check into these classes [#377](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/377)
  - Refine COSEKey classes nullability [#374](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/374)
  - Revisit nullability [#402](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/402)
  - Correct userHandle nullability [#422](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/422)
- Update UserVerificationMethod [#445](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/445)
- Deprecate a ServerProperty constructor whose origins arg is Collection [#415](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/415)
- Redesign JWS classes [#388](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/388)

## :star: Enhancements

- Add error member to Android Safetynet Attestation Response [#386](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/386)
- Add revocationCheckEnabled option [#460](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/460)
- Expose OriginValidator to public [#459](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/459)
- Make DeviceCheckManager.createObjectConverter public [#458](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/458)
- Make converters to throw DataConversionException when null check failed [#430](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/430)
- Add NullAppleAnonymousAttestationStatementValidator to createNonStrictWebAuthnRegistrationManager() [#419](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/419)
- Make AuthenticatorResponse public [#414](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/414)
- Make DCAssertion class public [#395](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/395)
- Polish CertPathSerializer [#387](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/387)
- Reformat code [#390](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/390)
- Remove deprecated suppressions [#391](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/391)
- Move docs build from Travis-CI to GitHub Actions [#452](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/452)
- Remove bintray dependency as it shutdowns [#473](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/473)

## :package: Dependency Upgrades

- Bump dependency-check-gradle from 6.1.0 to 6.1.5 [#478](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/478) [#477](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/477) [#472](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/472) [#468](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/468) [#461](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/461)
- Bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.3.4.RELEASE to 2.4.4 [#469](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/469) [#463](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/463) [#443](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/443) [#424](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/424) [#393](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/393) [#370](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/370)
- Bump build-info-extractor-gradle from 4.13.0 to 4.21.0 [#466](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/466) [#451](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/451) [#368](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/368)
- Bump asciidoctor-gradle-jvm from 3.2.0 to 3.3.0 [#464](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/464) [#457](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/457) [#384](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/384) 
- Bump mockitoVersion from 3.5.13 to 3.8.0 [#465](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/465) [#444](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/444) [#437](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/437) [#411](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/411) [#369](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/369) [#367](https://github.com/webauthn4j/webauthn4j/pull/367)
